thread.title: Reebok Drops a Pair of Furry Instapump Fury Sneakers
thread.title_full: Reebok Drops a Pair of Furry Instapump Fury Sneakers

author: Jesse Bernard
title: Reebok Drops a Pair of Furry Instapump Fury Sneakers
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
It’s likely that the latest iteration of the Reebok Instapump Fury may be the most extravagant yet. The iconic Reebok silhouette got a furry update fit for The Grinch.
Complimented with a white midsole, the upper is lined with green fur along with a red foot cage. They’re not the type of sneakers you wear everyday but when you do, they’ll most likely attract attention.
The shoe is available for purchase at select Reebok retailers now such as Antonoli for $284.
In other sneaker news, adidas drops the all-new adizero Sub2 designed for long-distance marathon running.
